CustomField.formula: "Termination Reason: " + CASE(Termination_Reason__c, "Beitragsanpassung (Lift)", "Subscription adjustment (Lift)", "Kostenreduktion", "Price/Benefit", "Aufgabe des Shops/Unternehmens", "Giving-up of Shop/Company", "Kundenservice", "Quality of service", "Prüfung/Monitoring", "Audit", "Sales", "Sales", "Vorsorgliche Kuendigung", "Precautionary cancellation", "Kein Grund genannt", "No reason mentioned", "Änderungskündigung", "Notice of termination pending a change of contract", "Garantierahmen/Bonität", "Warranty limit/solvency", "Insolvenz", "Insolvency", "Qualität/Kundenservice", "Compliance", "Zahlungsverzug", "Delay in payment", "Sonstige", "Others", "Sonstige TS", "Others TS", "Competitor", "Competitor", "Review-Service", "Review-Service", "Guarantee-Service", "Guarantee-Service", "")
CustomField.label: Termination reason english mapping
